document.full_text: exxon mobil corp  has made two big new oil discoveries and a natural gas find in the deepwater gulf of mexico, news that underscores the importance of the prolific basin to u.s. crude output.
document.title: exxon has 3 deepwater gulf of mexico discoveries
lines_and_colors: exxon mobil corp  has made two big new oil discoveries and a natural gas find in the deepwater gulf of mexico, news that underscores the importance of the prolific basin to u.s. crude output.
